name: Project 3: Right Here, Right Now
body:
# Right Here, Right Now This is the third and final project for CS 424 Fall 2014 under Professor Andrew Johnson. We are going to take a look at live data from the Chicago area, integrating a variety of sources onto a single leaflet map to help users make decisions about their travel plans. Projects 1 and 2 enabled their users to look for interesting features or trends in older data; the idea here is to give the user more timely data in order to make decisions. Right now we can get real-time weather, real-time automobile traffic, information on bike availability, etc. How can that data be integrated to allow the user to make more informed choices for how they want to get from point A to point B. ## Team Members Carlos Ortega
Nicholas Bessinas
Bryan Spahr
Abhinav Kumar ## Weekly Status Please click here to see the weekly contribution\status of each team member.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
